thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Guangzhou Rural Commercial Bank Receives Bond Issue​ Approvals

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangzhou Rural Commercial Bank Receives Bond Issue​ Approvals

organizations.name: reuters) - guangzhou rural commercial bank co ltd

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Guangzhou Rural Commercial Bank Co Ltd :
* GOT APPROVALS FROM GUANGDONG BUREAU OF CHINA BANKING REGULATORY COMMISSION & PEOPLE‘S BANK OF CHINA FOR BOND ISSUE​
* WILL ISSUE TIER-TWO CAPITAL BONDS IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF UP TO RMB10 BILLION​
* NET PROCEEDS FROM BONDS ISSUANCE TO BE USED TO REPLENISH BANK‘S CAPITAL BASE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
